data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Has anyone completed this? I couldn't find any guides or discussions online. I was able to find out who forged the reports to save Abelard's house however then I had to choose to execute one of the three others.

Can I avoid this completely by pardoning them before the trial?

Is it possible to find the manipulator during the trial?

I used it as a political opportunity to remove the Xeno hating house and keep the Drivestrem house (governors) in my pocket however I'd prefer not to execute a 1/4 of my nobles...
